languages.text: "Махарий, полагаю, сейчас тот самый случай, когда вам следует остановиться и не ухудшать собственное положение".

traits.locale_text: "Махарий, полагаю, сейчас тот самый случай, когда вам следует остановиться и не ухудшать собственное положение".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Macharius, now is a time when you would do well to stop and not make matters worse for yourself."
languages.original_text: "Махарий, полагаю, сейчас тот самый случай, когда вам следует остановиться и не ухудшать собственное положение".

traits.locale_text: "Macharias, I think that this is the case when it would be better for you to stop, and try to not make the matters worse for yourself."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Macharias, I think that this is the case when it would be better for you to stop, and try to not make the matters worse for yourself."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Macharius, I think this is the case when it would be better for you to stop and try to avoid making things more complicated."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Macharius, I think this is the case when it would be better for you to stop and try to avoid making things more complicated."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Macharius, now is a time when you would do well to stop and not make matters worse for yourself."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Macharius, now is a time when you would do well to stop and not make matters worse for yourself."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「マハリウス、今は言動を慎み、立場を悪化させないようにするのが身のためだ」
languages.original_text: "Macharius, now is a time when you would do well to stop and not make matters worse for yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「マハリウス、今は言動を慎み、立場を悪化させないようにするのが身のためだ」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “马卡里乌斯，这种时候最好别说蠢话，免得让你自己的立场越来越尴尬。”
languages.original_text: "Macharius, now is a time when you would do well to stop and not make matters worse for yourself."

traits.locale_text: “马卡里乌斯，这种时候最好别说蠢话，免得让你自己的立场越来越尴尬。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Macharius, au vu des circonstances, vous feriez bien de changer immédiatement d'attitude si vous ne voulez pas aggraver encore votre cas. »
languages.original_text: "Macharius, now is a time when you would do well to stop and not make matters worse for yourself."

traits.locale_text: « Macharius, au vu des circonstances, vous feriez bien de changer immédiatement d'attitude si vous ne voulez pas aggraver encore votre cas. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Macharius, creo que sería buen momento para detenerse y no empeorar más su situación».
languages.original_text: "Macharius, now is a time when you would do well to stop and not make matters worse for yourself."

traits.locale_text: «Macharius, creo que sería buen momento para detenerse y no empeorar más su situación».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Macharius, ich denke, es wird Zeit, aufzuhören und nicht alles noch schlimmer für Euch zu machen."
languages.original_text: "Macharius, now is a time when you would do well to stop and not make matters worse for yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Macharius, ich denke, es wäre besser für Euch, wenn Ihr versucht, die Dinge noch komplizierter zu machen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Macharius, haddini aşıyorsun. Dur ki başını daha çok belaya sokmayasın."
languages.original_text: "Macharius, now is a time when you would do well to stop and not make matters worse for yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Macharius, haddini aşıyorsun. Dur ki başını daha çok belaya sokmayasın."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
